example.title: A simple header without any source items in C.
example.programlisting: /****f* ModuleName/Foo * FUNCTION * Foo computes the foo factor * using a fudge factor. **** */

example.title: A header with source items in C.
The robodoc.rc file required for C if it were not supported by default.
A simple header without any source items in Modula-2.
example.programlisting: (****f* ModuleName/Foo * FUNCTION * Foo computes the foo factor * using a fudge factor. **** *)

example.title: A header with source items in Modula-2.
example.programlisting:
(****f* ModuleName/Foo * FUNCTION * Foo computes the foo factor * using a fudge factor. * SYNOPSIS *) int Foo( int fudge ) (* * INPUTS * fudge -- the fudge factor * SOURCE *)
more source code..
(*****)

example.title: The robodoc.rc file required for Modula-2 if it were not supported by default.
example.programlisting: header markers: (**** remark markers: * end markers: **** (**** remark begin markers: (* remark end markers: *)
